column18:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • The perfect gear to protect your eyes from the harsh sun while keeping you stylish at the same time. This trendy pair of sunglasses from Fluxx is the perfect accessory to complete your cool-casual look.

  • Product Details

  • Lens colour: Grey
    Lens type: High grade polymer lens with 100% UV protection
    Frame colour: Transparent with grey accents
    Frame type: Acetate
    High bridge and fixed nose pads
    Comes in a hard case
    Warranty: 90 days against manufacturing defects

  • Material & Care

  • Acetate
    Remove dust and grime by gently wiping the lens with the cloth provided

  • Size & Fit

  • Lens width: 55 mm
